case_title: Mst. RAHAM BIBI vs AZMAT HAYAT KHATTAK, ADVOCATE

judgment_summary.complaint_details: Mst. Raham Bibi alleged professional misconduct against her son, Azmat Hayat Khattak, Advocate, for challenging a decree he had previously secured for her as counsel.
judgment_summary.allegations: Violation of professional ethics by challenging the decree obtained for the complainant.
judgment_summary.disciplinary_proceedings: Complaint adjourned sine die by Disciplinary Committee of N.-W.F.P. Bar Council.
judgment_summary.appeal_decision: Appeal accepted, respondent found guilty of professional misconduct.

penalty.recovery_process: Execution by District Judge Kohat under section 44(3)(b) of the Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973

legal_references: Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973

directions.to_district_judge: Dispose of pending civil suit between the parties expeditiously.
